title: 307: CHATTY BROS: Gray Gives Evan a Tarot Reading + BIP Debates!
itunes:title: 307: CHATTY BROS: Gray Gives Evan a Tarot Reading + BIP Debates!
description:
Grayston and Evan are back to Bro down and celebrate Gray’s birthday, do a tarot card reading, spill the tea on Jess’ new hobby, chat weed, debate the Ivan phone scandal, discuss Gray’s Burning Man experience, cover Evan’s new life goal, process the Noah/Abigail conversation, and much more! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***PILL CLUB: go to THEPILLCLUB.COM/CHATTY is offering a $10 donation to BEDSIDER.ORG for every Chatty Broads listener who becomes a patient!

***GROVE: go to GROVE.COM/CHATTY you will get to choose a FREE starter set with your first order!

***EDMUNDS: Visit EDMUNDS.COM to see their Best Car Rankings and search for vehicles near you!

***ETTITUDE: Order today for free shipping and 20% off your order at ETTITDE.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY

***CROWD HEALTH: for a limited time, our listeners get their first month free - AND, after you’ve been a member, CrowdHealth will include a Fitness Wearable - just go to JOINCROWDHEALTH.COM/FIT and enter code CHATTY at sign up!

 

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: 

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
